slides.text: Glitch up your photos in seconds!
slides.title: Glitch

slides.text: Choose a photo with a dark background. Tap Effects > Glitch  > CH1 > slide to adjust.
slides.title: Apply Glitch

slides.text: Tap CH1 again to adjust Color. Tap checkmark.
slides.title: Choose Your Colors

slides.text: Tap Filters > Film > choose a preset. We chose FL7.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Mix a geometric shape and a landscape photo into mysterious art.
slides.title: Hidden Landscape

slides.text: Start with a landscape photo. Tap Frame > ES2. Slide to adjust. Tap checkmark.
slides.title: Add Frame

slides.text: Tap + to add an Element Layer. Replace the given Element to ES20. Move to adjust composition.
slides.title: Geometric Style

slides.text: Tap the back arrow and adjust Color and Blending.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Use Text and Elements to create an awesome composition.
slides.title: No Limits

slides.text: Tap the + to add an Element. Replace the added Element with ES6 and place it slightly off center.
slides.title: Element #1

slides.text: Tap the back arrow to set the Color to your choice > tap Blending and select Overlay.
slides.title: Color & Blending

slides.text: Repeat the previous 2 steps, but use Darken for the Blending mode (instead of Overlay).
slides.title: Element #2

slides.text: Tap + to add a Text Layer and tap the Layer to edit the text. Tap Spacing adjust the layout.
slides.title: Leave A Message

slides.text: Use Eraser to erase parts of the text.
slides.title: Erase

slides.text: Tap Effects > Vignette to add more focus to your masterpiece.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Use Layers and Filters to give any ordinary portrait a suprising twist.
slides.title: Urban Animal

slides.text: Start with any portrait. Tap + to add a new photo of an animal.
slides.title: Combine Images

slides.text: Use Eraser to erase everything but the animal's head. Fit the head in place.
slides.title: Erase Parts

slides.text: Long press the top Layer. Drag & drop it over the bottom Layer to merge the images.
slides.title: Merge Layers

slides.text: Tap Filters. Select a dramatic filter, like MG6.
slides.title: Filter Time

slides.text: Explore more Filters for a different result.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Combine photos and create a surreal, new world.
slides.title: Coffee Road

slides.text: Tap + to add a coffee photo. Resize the photo to cover the background image.
slides.title: Add Coffee

slides.text: Hold and drag the coffee image below your original photo.
slides.title: Arrange Layers

slides.text: Select top layer. Use Eraser to erase parts of the photo.
slides.title: Erase

slides.text: Drag & drop layers to merge. Tap Effects > Vignette > Pinch to adjust.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Create a brilliant Double Exposure effect using Layers.
slides.title: Double Exposure

slides.text: Select a photo. Tap + to add a second photo. Enlarge the second photo to cover the first layer.
slides.title: Pick Photos

slides.text: Tap Blending. Select the Lighten Blending pack.
slides.title: Blend It

slides.text: Tap + to add a 3rd photo. Consider composition when moving and resizing.
slides.title: New Layer

slides.text: Tap Blending. Select any Blending mode. Use the Eraser tool where needed.
slides.title: Blend Again

slides.text: Get creative! Repeat the steps using different Blending modes.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Let your spirit free with this magical collage.
slides.title: Cloud Wanderer

slides.text: Tap + to add a cloud photo. Resize the photo to cover the background image.
slides.title: Add Clouds

slides.text: Hold and drag the cloud image Layer below your original photo. Tap + to add an Element Layer.
slides.title: Arrange Layers

slides.text: Replace the given Element with ES12 and adjust composition
slides.title: Element Composition

slides.text: Use Eraser to erase parts of the Element.
slides.title: Erase & Reveal

slides.text: Select middle Layer. Tap the Eraser and swipe within the Element to bring out the clouds.
slides.title: Reveal More

slides.text: Drag & drop Layers to merge. Tap Brushes > Magic > Brush tip > ES8. Swipe to decorate.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Create this unique Insta-pic using Layers. A person dressed in dark colors will work best.
slides.title: Pastel Power

slides.text: Tap + to add a cloud photo. Resize the photo to cover the background image.
slides.title: Add Clouds

slides.text: Tap Blending. Select Lighten.
slides.title: Double Exposure

slides.text: Hold & drag top layer over the bottom Layer to merge.
slides.title: Merge Layers

slides.text: Use Eraser to erase the background.
slides.title: Remove Background

slides.text: Tap + to add a Fill Layer. Hold and drag it below your original image.
slides.title: Layer & Reorder

slides.text: Tap Convert. Now, you'll be editing this Layer as an image.
slides.title: Convert it

slides.text: Tap Effects > Duo > ES6. Tap again to change Blending to Normal. Pick Colors 1 & 2. Tap checkmark.
slides.title: Add Gradient

slides.text: Tap + to add an Element Layer. Long press and drag it to be the middle Layer.
slides.title: Layer & Reorder Again

slides.text: Convert this Layer to an image by tapping Convert. This will allow for more editing!
slides.title: Convert it

slides.text: Tap Effects > Duo > pick any preset. Tap again > Blending > Normal. Tap the back arrow > tap Color to adjust. Tap the checkmark.
slides.title: More Gradients

slides.text: Drag & drop layers to merge. Tap Effects > Light FX. Now add Flare with FL4.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Turn a landscape into a surreal experience. Start with a landscape photo.
slides.title: Surreal Mountain

slides.text: Tap and drag your landscape Layer onto the + to Duplicate. Then, select the top Layer.
slides.title: Duplicate

slides.text: Tap Frame > ES2. Tap again to enter preset tools.
slides.title: Add a Frame

slides.text: Tap Fit, use your finger & move the image to expose more of the mountains. Tap checkmark.
slides.title: Perfect Composition

slides.text: Tap Transform > V-Flip.
slides.title: Flip It

slides.text: Use Eraser to erase frame & excess sky. Adjust composition.
slides.title: Erase the Frame

slides.text: Tap & drag one layer over another to Merge. Tap Filters to enhance colors.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: To create this colorful portrait you’ll need a BW image. Tap Filters > BW > pick a preset to make one.
slides.title: Watercolor Portrait

slides.text: Tap + to add a photo of a colorful splash. Pinch the photo to cover the background image.
slides.title: Add Some Color!

slides.text: Tap Blending. Select Lighten.
slides.title: Blending

slides.text: Long press the top layer. Drag & drop it over the bottom Layer to merge images.
slides.title: Merge Layers

slides.text: Tap + to add a Fill Layer.
slides.title: Layer Again

slides.text: Tap Paper. Select the paper you like best and tap the back arrow.
slides.title: Add Texture

slides.text: Tap Blending > select Multiply.
slides.title: Blend Again

slides.text: Drag & drop the top Layer over the bottom Layer to merge.
slides.title: Merge Again

slides.text: Tap Filters > Film > FL1. Tap again to adjust and tap Scratches. Select Specks > SP7. Tap checkmark.
slides.title: More Texture

slides.text: Tap + and add an Element Layer to finalize your composition.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Add a colorful twist to a portrait using Effects & Elements.
slides.title: Frametastic

slides.text: Tap + to add an empty Layer. Now you’ll be working on that empty Layer.
slides.title: Layer It

slides.text: Tap Brushes > Magic > Brush Tip. Select ES7 and apply to your photo.
slides.title: Splash!

slides.text: Tap + to add an Element. Replace the added Element with ES10, fit over the image.
slides.title: Frame Your Face

slides.text: Tap the back arrow to adjust the color.
slides.title: Color it

slides.text: Tap the Eraser tool to reveal the parts inside the Element.
slides.title: Erase & Reveal

slides.text: Try out more Magic Brush packs for a different look.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Welcome Summer with a typographic tutorial that's bold & bright!
slides.title: Bold & Beautiful

slides.text: Tap Frame. Select BO1, swipe to adjust. Tap preset again to pick a Color.
slides.title: Choose Frame

slides.text: Tap + to add a Text Layer.
slides.title: New Layer

slides.text: Tap Edit to type an inspiring message. Tap Font and select CR3. Tap the back arrow.
slides.title: Personalize It

slides.text: Tap Convert to make this Layer an Image Layer. Now, you'll be working on this Layer as an image.
slides.title: Convert It

slides.text: Tap Effects > Duo. Tap the preset twice to choose its Shape and Colors. Try different Blending modes. Tap checkmark.
slides.title: Gradient Upgrade

slides.text: Use Eraser to hide parts of the text "behind" your image.
slides.title: Hide Text

slides.text: Drag & drop Layers to merge, then add a Filter for a final tweak.
slides.title: Finishing Touch

slides.text: Give any photo a nostalgic feeling with this 90’s throwback tutorial.
slides.title: Teen Spirit

slides.text: Start with any portrait. Tap Filter > Film Pack > pick a preset. Tap it again to adjust & experiment.
slides.title: Analog Vibe

slides.text: Tap Scratches. Select ES1 & slide to adjust. Tap checkmark.
slides.title: Add Scratches

slides.text: Tap Effects > Light FX > ES9. Tap ES9 again to set Hue to 11. Tap checkmark.
slides.title: Light Leak

slides.text: Give your image focus. Tap Effects > Vignette > pinch to adjust.
slides.title: Finishing Touch
